Html: When I open the irony solution in visual studio 2010, it says I need silverlight, and gives me a link to install it, but when I run the install program, it says I already have silverlight 64 bit. Any ideas what's going on?
do you really need silverlight? Silverlight project is optional, so if you're not going to use Irony in SL, just remove the project from the solution.
nope, don't need it. ok, i'll remove it.
